title: *Janna uses her whirlwind to interrupt Zac's jump into the Dragon pit.*
body:
Vayne: "LOL, I did NOT know you could do that!"

Plat 2 bois.

Plat 2.

replies.body: Most CC does not apply until the end of dashes, after the update early this year. This is a weird edge case, i guess. Is this just a thing with knockup?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=q5lR5cAn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-29T03:18:31.916+0000)
>
> Most CC does not apply until the end of dashes, after the update early this year. This is a weird edge case, i guess. Is this just a thing with knockup?

Airborne effects (knock ups, knock backs, knock asides) all interrupt dashes. All other CC do no apply until the end of a dash.

The only exception is Yasuo's dash, which is completely interrupted by all CC. Now if only people could use that knowledge instead of being forever salty.
Learn something new from the game ever time :)
lul same guy from yesterday btw tf?....
